item.title: Rust_environment
item.description: Install Rust curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh Update Rust rustup update Cargo commands build your project with cargo build run your project with cargo run test your project with cargo test build documentation for your project with cargo doc publish a library to crates.io with cargo publish
